mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_application ( type, student_idx, title, content, reg_dt, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{applicationType}, #{studentIdx}, #{applicationTitle}, #{applicationContent} now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT type as applicationType, student_idx as studentIdx, title as applicationTitle, content as applicationContent, reg_dt as applicationRegDt, mod_dt as applicationModDt FROM app_application WHERE flag != 'deleted' AND type = #{applicationType} AND student_idx = #{studentIdx}
